work.heading: UpCycle
work.description: UpCycle is a collaborative web project that documents the learning of TidalCycles (a music programming language made for live-coding). Features: P5.js (with P5 Sound) for audio playback and visualiser, RegEx for syntax highlighting, HTML/CSS/JavaScript.

work.heading: ComPoser
work.description: ComPoser utilises machine learning technology to control sound with a series of user-generated poses. Features: ML5, PoseNet, P5, HTML/CSS/JavaScript.

work.heading: Mesh Audio
work.description: A sound installation exploring mesh network communication. Features: esp32 microcontrollers programmed with C.
